title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart, Stock of the Day Nov. 1
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart, Stock of the Day Nov. 1
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Chart of the Day"on what oranges, bowling balls have to do with U.S. stocks. \u0010He also has his "Stock of the Day" Halyard Health (HYH). Halyard Health Inc.'s shares rose to their highest price since the company was spun off from Kimberly-Clark Corp. three years ago. Halyard agreed to sell a hospital-product unit to Owens & Minor Inc. for $710 million, a deal that will let the company focus on medical devices. In addition, Halyard posted third-quarter earnings and revenue that beat the average analyst estimates in a Bloomberg survey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
